id: Job Search & Cover Letter Notion Template (with AI)
name: Job Search & Cover Letter Notion Template (with AI)
description: Job Search Template & AI Cover Letter Generator Make looking for a new job easy easier with this Job Search Notion template! This template has two databases for you to keep track of your job applications and any network contacts you want to reach out to. The home page will keep you on track with views for the most important listings: your upcoming interviews, and your to-do list of applications and contacts. If you're subscribed to Notion AI you can also take advantage of additional resource
